description: Request to create a new snapshot of a table with the provided information.

versionComment.description: Optional. If createSnapshot=true, the comment to be applied to the resulting version of the snapshot.  Null by default

versionLabel.description: Optional. If createSnapshot=true, the label to be applied to the resulting version of the snapshot.  Null by default

versionActivityId.description: Optional. If createSnapshot=true, the Activity ID to be applied to the resulting version of the snapshot.  Null by default
